Basic Interact Model

InteRactModel
InteRactModel objects
interact()
Create a new InteRactModel object
fundamentals()
Lookup EPA ratings of terms in a $dictionary
add_equation()
Set up additional transformation equations

Methods

deflection()
Calculate ABO event deflection scores
get_fundamentals() get_transients() get_element_wise_deflection() get_long_form()
Extract deflection score attributes
optimal_behavior()
Calculate the Optimal Behavior for the Actor or Object following an Event
reidentify()
Reidentification of actor or object, following an event
max_confirm()
Identify the behavior that would maximally confirm the identities of actor in an actor-object pairing
closest_terms()
Get closest terms to an EPA profile
modify_identity()
Create EPA profile for modified identities
characteristic_emotion()
Estimate EPA profile of a characteristic emotion
